tasks.title: Shared policy inheritance (Multi-Repo Organization Dashboard)
tasks.description: Allow org-level policy.yaml that child projects inherit and can override. Load from .roady/org.yaml, merge with project-level policy.yaml, expose via PolicyService and MCP.

tasks.title: Cross-project drift detection (Multi-Repo Organization Dashboard)
tasks.description: Detect drift patterns spanning multiple repositories. Extend OrgService.AggregateMetrics() to include per-project drift counts, add cross-project drift correlation, expose via CLI --drift flag and MCP.

tasks.title: Plugin registry with versioning (Plugin System Hardening)
tasks.description: Maintain a registry of available plugins with version compatibility checking. Store in .roady/plugins.yaml with name, path, version, last-checked. Add CLI: roady plugin list/register/unregister.

tasks.title: Plugin health monitoring (Plugin System Hardening)
tasks.description: Runtime health checks and graceful degradation for loaded plugins. Periodic ping via Init(), track response times, mark unhealthy after N failures, expose via roady plugin status and MCP.

tasks.title: Pluggable messaging adapters (Notification Integration)
tasks.description: Define a MessagingAdapter interface for team messaging platforms. Implement Slack adapter as reference, with channel routing and mention configuration. Adapters reuse WebhookNotifier retry infrastructure. Additional adapters (Discord, Teams) follow the same interface.

tasks.title: Realtime event streaming (Notification Integration)
tasks.description: SSE or WebSocket push for live project state updates. Add /events/stream SSE endpoint to MCP HTTP server, subscribe to InMemoryEventPublisher, broadcast domain events to connected clients.

tasks.title: Auto-sync workflows (Watch Mode Enhancement)
tasks.description: Automatically trigger drift detection and plan reconciliation on file changes. Enhance FSWatcher callback to optionally run spec analyze + drift detect + plan generate pipeline. Add --reconcile flag to watch command.

tasks.title: Selective watch patterns (Watch Mode Enhancement)
tasks.description: Configurable glob patterns to watch specific files or directories. Add --include and --exclude flags to watch command. Filter FSWatcher events against compiled glob patterns before triggering callbacks.
